data.title: Employer Matching Gifts
data.meta_description: Many employers match charitable contributions of their current and retired employees. Learn how to get that match to Scouting.
data.text:
Your contribution to the San Diego-Imperial Council may be multiplied. Many local and national companies will match the charitable contributions of their current and retired employees. Many companies match dollar to dollar. Some companies double the amount given by their employee.

Also, many local and national companies will make a contribution based on the number of volunteer hours you do.

If your company is eligible, request a matching gift form from your employer, and send it completed and signed with your gift. We will do the rest. If needed: We will complete the remaining portion of the form - providing validation and forwarding the application to the company for processing. The impact of your gift to the San Diego-Imperial Council may be doubled or possibly tripled! Some companies match gifts made by retirees and/or spouses.

Here are the 3 easy steps to multiply your gift:

Make your donation or your time or money to the San Diego Imperial Council

Complete a Matching Gift or Volunteer Incentive Program form available from your employer

Send in your Application to:

San Diego-Imperial Council

Finance Department

1207 Upas Street

San Diego CA 92103

Below is a list of companies that have participated in these programs. If your company does not appear below please check with your Personnel Department. If you would like your company to be added to the list please call 619.298.6121 and ask for the Finance Department.
